pages.title: FE Charging Port
pages.text: The Forge Charging Port allows you to use the energy stored in your Energizer to charge items that use the Forge Energy $(l:bigreactors:misc/powersystem)power system$(/l) to function.$(br2)Open the graphical interface of the port and insert the item you want to charge into the input slot in the center.

Once the item's energy buffer is full, the item will be automatically moved to the interface output slot for you to collect.$(br2)If, for any reason, you need to stop the charging process, press the eject button to move the item to the output slot immediately.

pages.usage.text: $(l)Mandatory:$() no$(br)$(l)Valid positions:$() any face (not on frame)$(br)$(l)Graphical interface:$() yes
